name: Pangu
tagline: Toolkit to detect/crash/attack GNu debugging-related tools
body:
```
--       _____ _____ _____ _____ __ __
(o_     |  _  |  _  |   | |   __|  |  |
//\     |   __|     | | | |  |  |  |  |
v_/_    |__|  |__|__|_|___|_____|_____|
```

Pangu a a little toolset to mess around with debugging-related
tools from the GNU project, and especially on GNU/Linux x86.

# Features:
    - detection of GBD
    - screwing elf headers in order to crash GNU tools
    - crashing GDB

# Todo list:
    - detection of breakpoints
    - moar GDB crashes !
